Name,
Registration is open for our next Justia Webinar, Using ChatGPT & AI Tools for Writing Law Firm Marketing Content: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly.

On Thursday, March 30 at 2:00 p.m. ET, Marina Wilson, Sr. Product & Marketing Specialist at Justia, and Justia CEO Tim Stanley will lead a conversational-style presentation exploring the legal marketing implications of ChatGPT and other AI content generation tools.
Interest in this presentation is growing, and registrations are rolling in, so be sure to RSVP and get on the guest list before it is too late!
